summary:
Procter & Gamble (P&G) is a large American company that makes many everyday products. Founded in 1837, it is based in Cincinnati, Ohio. P&G creates items for personal care, hygiene, and around the home. Some well-known brands include Pampers, Gillette, and Oral-B.

In the past, they made food and snacks, but they decided to focus on their most profitable areas. This change made P&G a more streamlined company with popular brands. In 2023, it was ranked high among the world's largest companies. Jon Moeller has been the CEO since 2021.
title: Procter & Gamble
